titles.title: Preventing an Unrealistic FMAP Act
A bill preventing an unrealistic future Medicaid augmentation plan.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/15/2013--Introduced. Preventing an Unrealistic FMAP Act - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to repeal amendments by the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act with respect to increased federal medical percentages (FMAPs, or federal matching amounts) for: (1) newly eligible mandatory individuals, and (2) certain states.
